root.name: Sequence Blocks
root.description: This plugin allows one to use various basic sequence operations within Blocks.
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.8.0.3 Date 2014-06-03 17:59:58
Fixed a minor issue with "Save Sequence" block.
- Version 1.8.0.2 Date 2014-06-03 11:48:25
Fixed "CropCZT" bloc.
- Version 1.8.0.1 Date 2014-05-12 17:26:01
fixed getMetaData params id.
- Version 1.8.0.0 Date 2014-05-12 16:17:49
* added new blocs for metadata load / read operations. * removed resizeNew bloc and improved original resize bloc instead. * others minors changes / tweaks.
- Version 1.7.2.2 Date 2014-04-28 11:50:26
typo
- Version 1.7.2.1 Date 2014-04-28 11:48:04
Added serie input field for the "load sequence" bloc.
- Version 1.7.2.0 Date 2014-03-27 13:20:00
* added 'Convert Color' bloc * added 'Resize New' bloc * some minors fixes / tweaks
- Version 1.7.1.0 Date 2013-08-23 18:18:19
* corrected Resize for backward compatibility
- Version 1.7.0.0 Date 2013-07-22 15:40:40
* added Get Name * added Get Channel Name * added Set channel name * added Get resolution (same as Get meta data, name is better and more accurate)
- Version 1.6.1.0 Date 2013-07-03 14:51:22
* corrected issues with VarListeners in the Resize block.
- Version 1.6.0.0 Date 2013-07-03 11:18:19
* added a Resize block.
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2013-06-05 14:16:44
* Corrected bug in Combine Channels.
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-05-22 15:39:42
* Corrected issue with Save Sequence
- Version 1.3.2.1b Date 2013-03-13 16:51:26
Corrected error about extractStack not found.
- Version 1.3.2.0 Date 2013-03-12 13:31:47
Now appears under the "Sequence" section in Protocols!
- Version 1.2.1.4 Date 2013-02-28 17:11:04
Fixed set pixel resolution bloc.
- Version 1.2.1.3 Date 2013-02-28 17:08:39
Regression from version 1.2.0.0
- Version 1.2.1.2 Date 2013-02-28 16:59:36
Regression from version 1.2.0.0
- Version 1.2.1.1 Date 2013-02-28 16:57:50
Fixed set pixel resolution bloc.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-01-07 16:30:00
Corrected an inversion between Extract Time and Extract Slice
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2012-10-22 14:12:41
* corrected issue with file blocks
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-10-17 13:58:03
* Block with File inputs are now mutable, they can have a string as a parameter
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2012-09-27 11:22:17
Added an option in SaveSequence block to save in multiple file.
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2012-09-06 10:43:32
Added sequence getFilename() block to retrieve the filename used to open / save a sequence.
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2012-08-22 10:33:26
Fixed GetMetadata block.
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2012-06-22 15:17:27
Added Description to the Blocks. Corrected Save Sequence block name.
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 15:37:19
First real version.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-06-21 15:00:05
